title: Annual statements
context: [ยง431P-8] Annual statements. (a) The fund shall submit to the commissioner each year, not later than one hundred twenty days after the end of the fund&rsquo;s fiscal year, a financial report in a form approved by the commissioner. (b) The commissioner may require other reports concerning risks insured by the fund as the commissioner deems appropriate. [L 1993, c 339, pt of ยง2]
